item.description:
Sunday July 11, 2010, at 7 pm is our Spiritual Service and Transformational Meditation:
All are invited:


Our Multi-faith ministry,Pathways of Love and Light, service includes a teaching on bringing spirituality into our daily lives, a meditation that reinforces the lesson, and then messages from loved ones who have crossed into the Light.

It is an one hour service with light refreshments at the end.

Open to all.

Fee: by donation only

group.name: The Mount Sinai Life Transformation Meetup Group

item.name: Sprirtual Service and transformational meditation
